sub_title: Forecast Analysis || Sales Pattern Analysis || Price Analysis.
summary: My area of expertise lies on Time Series data analysis. Specifically, I focus on identifying hourly and daily sales patterns to gain valuable insights. By examining these patterns, I can help uncover crucial information that can greatly benefit your business. Moreover, I have extensive experience in generating Time Series Forecasts. This entails utilizing advanced analytical techniques to estimate the expected number of sales or customer arrivals for upcoming hours and days. These forecasts provide a valuable tool for strategic decision-making, allowing you to plan ahead with confidence and optimize your operations accordingly.
